name: avant-garde lamp
description: This avant-garde lamp adds a stylish touch to any space. Its modern design and high-quality finish make it perfect for contemporary living rooms or offices.

name: chic chair
description: The Chic Chair combines elegance with comfort. Its refined upholstery and ergonomic shape make it an ideal choice for modern dining areas or stylish offices.

name: comfy bed
description: Experience ultimate relaxation with this comfy bed. Designed with plush materials and sturdy construction, it guarantees restful nights and a cozy bedroom aesthetic.

name: contemporary sofa
description: This contemporary sofa offers both style and comfort. Its sleek lines and durable fabric make it a perfect centerpiece for any modern living room.
